Name: Perdition
Details: Perdition is mostly made up of water and has three continents: Hel, Hades, and Purgatory. The capital city, Damnation, is located on Hel. Once the provincial capital of the Taurian worlds between the Hyades and Badlands star clusters, Perdition retains a strong financial sector and several key weapon industries, including working BattleMech factories.
